name: Pirate Theater (2018)
description:
Created in 48 hours for Kiwijam 2018 - theme: Single-Use.

A local-multiplayer brawler focused on item pickups.

Inspired by Power Stone (Capcom, 1999).

A post-jam level was made as a co-op platformer inspired by Super Mario 3D World (Nintendo, 2013).

Credits

  • Adam Thompson
  • Alejandra Vargas
  • Andy Chiang
